page.name: Web Cloud
page.page_description: Welcome to the Web Cloud status page for real-time information on system performance and availability.
page.headline: Web Cloud OVHcloud Status : incidents, maintenance
page.notifications_email_footer: You received this email because you are subscribed to Web Cloud's service status notifications.

components.name: Identity, Security & Operations || Key Management Service

incidents.name: [GRA][Databases] - CloudDB incident notification
incidents.message: We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our CloudDB and Web Hosting databases has been resolved. Start time : 11/12/2025 08:45 UTC End time : 11/12/2025 14:29 UTC Root Cause : This incident is caused by this maintenance : https://network.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/myk3t1zkb4tz We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

incidents.name: [GLOBAL][Collaborative solutions] - Hosted Exchange incident notification
incidents.message: We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Collaborative solutions offering has been resolved. Start time : 11/12/2025 08:25 UTC End time : 11/12/2025 11:17 UTC Root Cause : The delay was due to a queueing issue that has now been resolved. No emails were lost during the incident. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

incidents.message: We would like to inform you that the incident on our Databases offering has now been resolved. Here is detail for this incident : Start time : 10/12/2025 09:09 UTC End time : 10/12/2025 11:16 UTC Root Cause : A service disruption occurred due to an unexpected underlying infrastructure malfunction. We thank you for your understanding and patience throughout this incident.

incidents.name: [FR][Internet Access] - ADSL/SDSL/FTTH incident notification
incidents.message: We are pleased to inform you that the incident affecting our Internet Access offer in the departments: 45, 50, 62, 60, 59, 46, 80, 40, 91, 34, 09, 35, 22, 33, 64, 37, 38, 27 and 13 has been resolved. Start time : 10/12/2025 01:15 UTC End time : 10/12/2025 11:31UTC Root Cause : This incident was caused by our provider. We apologize for any inconvenience caused and appreciate your understanding.

incidents.name: [GLOBAL][Domains] - Domains Name incident notification on .DK
incidents.message: We have determined the origin of the incident affecting our .DK Domains offer, customers in the impacted zone are unable to perform some tasks on .DK domains. Here are some supplementary details : Start time : 10/12/2025 09:15 UTC Impacted Service(s) : Multiple operations (Registration, Renew, Transfer, Restore, Delete) are temporarily unavailable for .DK domains. Customers Impact : Customers are temporarily unable to perform specified operations on .DK domains. Root Cause : This incident is caused by a maintenance of one of our providers. Ongoing Actions : The incident has been identified and our teams are mobilised to restore service as quickly as possible.

incidents.message: We are currently experiencing an ongoing incident. We have determined the origin of the issue affecting our OverTheBox offer. We will keep you updated on the progress and resolution.
